name: Minis
description:
A collection of mini games and prototypes worked on by yours truly!

Included Windows Builds:

Door Wizard v0.13.1 (as programmer, game designer, and assistant producer)
Play as a Door Wizard apprentice and harness your magic as you explore the realms beyond!

Magic Shop: Shopkeeper's Daymare v0.1.2 (as developer)
Help the shopkeeper tidy up the mess of flying books her shop has become.

Potion Craft v0.0.13.3 (as programmer, game designer, and producer)
You are officially beheld as a master of Potion Crafting, but rather than glory, what awaits you is more akin to endless customer orders and routine work of a Potion Master.

UnderMining v0.4.3 (as developer)
Small mining prototype serving as a preface to resource gathering, inspired by Pokemon Underground.

WORLDBUILDERz v0.3.2 (as programmer and game designer)
A short, immersive 3D experience consisting of a questionnaire and a fictional terrain generator, where the player's answers are used as parameters to create unique spaces!
